MondstadtList.title: Mondstadt Commissions
MondstadtList.description:
12 achievements can be obtained during or by completing commissions in the region of Mondstadt.

Mondstadt's Commissions are unlocked after completing the World Quest Every Day a New Adventure which becomes available after reaching Adventure Rank 12.

For the Love of Godwin

  • Whispers in the Wind

Taking Responsibility for Your Actions

  • Pigeon, Duck, and Child
  • Sorry, Timmie!

Making Do

  • The Limitations of an Adventurer

"Dear Daddy..."

  • Amber丨Lepus Chapter: Act 1
  • Pigeons Go AWOL
  • A Boy's Letter

Marvelous Medicine

  • Miracle Medicine
  • Recuperating From a Severe Illness

Anna's Adventures

  • Miracle Medicine
  • Recuperating From a Severe Illness
  • Adventurer Exam: Battle Tactics
  • Snapshots
  • Adventurer Exam: The Art of Adventure
  • Adventurer Exam: Taking Flight
  • Anna the Adventurer!

In the Name of Favonius

  • A Surprise Gift

Get Your Own Emergency Food!

  • Food Delivery

...Odomu?

  • Language Exchange

Yo dala?

  • Language Exchange
  • Poetry Exchange

Perfectionist

  • Reliable Helper

Telling It How It Is

  • Tales of Winter

Mondstadt02.notes: To obtain the commission Sorry, Timmie! you must kill at least one duck during the commission Pigeon, Duck, and Child.

Mondstadt03.requirement: Complete the commission by bringing back the Materials for Training Dummy.
Mondstadt03.notes: The Materials for Training Dummy are obtained by destroying the training dummy during the commission.

Mondstadt04.notes:
To obtain the commission A Boy's Letter you need to pick up the Draff's Letter during the commission Pigeons Go AWOL.

The commission Pigeons Go AWOL has 3 versions so the letter does not always appear (The versions are Pigeons only, Camp without letter and Camp with letter).

Mondstadt05.notes: To obtain the commission Recuperating From a Severe Illness you must complete the commission Miracle Medicine (3 times).

Mondstadt06.notes:
To obtain the commission Anna the Adventurer! you must complete the commissions:

  • Miracle Medicine
  • Recuperating From a Severe Illness
  • Adventurer Exam: Battle Tactics
  • Adventurer Exam: The Art of Adventure
  • Adventurer Exam: Taking Flight

You must also answer correctly to the questions in the commission Adventurer Exam: Taking Flight.
The correct answers are:

  • One person per glider
  • To select appropriate take-off points and to assume the correct take-off posture
  • Select an appropriate landing spot, and do not fold your wind glider in abruptly

Mondstadt07.requirement: Complete the commission by selecting the option Vile might have some suggestions for us. during the first conversation with Rudolf.
Mondstadt07.notes: The option Vile might have some suggestions for us. appears on the fourth time you receive the commission.

Mondstadt08.requirement: Eat the food instead of delivering it.
Mondstadt08.notes: The food can be found in the Quest section of the inventory.

Mondstadt09.requirement: Complete the commission by successfully speaking to the Hilichurls.
Mondstadt09.notes: Ella can fail even without being spotted by the Hilichurls at the camp.
Mondstadt09.videoLink: Nepyutsu (First chapter of the video)

Mondstadt10.requirement: Complete the commission by selecting the correct dialogues.
Mondstadt10.notes: The correct dialogues are Celi dada, mimi nunu!, Ye dada! and Muhe ye!.
Mondstadt10.videoLink: Nepyutsu (Second chapter of the video)

Mondstadt11.requirement: Correctly complete the three versions of the commission.
Mondstadt11.notes:
The player chooses the version during the first dialogue with Tsarevich.
The versions are foot of the mountains, mountainside and mountaintop.

If the selected version is:

  • Foot of the mountains: Defeat the Hilichurls and return in less than 1 minute.
  • Mountainside: Defeat the Hilichurls without destroying any crates.
  • Mountaintop: Defeat the Hilichurls in the correct order. (Axe Mitachurl, Shield Mitachurl then Samachurl)

Mondstadt12.requirement: Complete the three versions of the commission.
Mondstadt12.notes:
The player chooses the version during the first dialogue with Viktor.
The versions are Fatui, Delusions and Tsaritsa.

LiyueList.title: Liyue Commissions
LiyueList.description:
16 achievements can be obtained during or by completing commissions in the region of Liyue.

Liyue's Commissions are unlocked after completing the World Quest New Horizons of Adventure which becomes available after completing Archon Quest For a Tomorrow Without Tears (Prologue: Act II).

Pirates! Argh!

  • Pirate Invasion, in Liyue Harbor!

Prelude to the Journey

  • Pirate Invasion, in Liyue Harbor!
  • Growing Pains
  • Ahoy! A Pirate's Growth for Ye!
  • Troubles Traveling Through Tributaries
  • The Little Pirate Goes Out to Sea

A Nourishing Friendship

  • Fishing Jiangxue
  • Yanxiao's Dilemma

Love Is All Around

  • Good Sign

Level Up

  • A Provisional Arrangement
  • Stairway to Wangshu

Beginner's Luck

  • Diamond in the Rough...

Scholarly Pretensions

  • The Lost Relic
  • A Little Raid

Poet Vs. Paycheck

  • One Ship, Two Ships, Three Ships...
  • So-Called Work

All's Well That Ends Well

  • This Novel Is Amazing!
  • Book in the Woods
  • Will of Stone
  • For Old Time's Sake

This Novel Is Amazing!

  • Xingqiu丨Fabulae Textile Chapter: Act 1
  • This Novel Is Amazing!

Open to Interpretation

  • Good Sign

Swordseeker

  • Where Is the Unseen Razor?

To Walk The Horizon...?

  • The Sparrow Studies the Blade
  • Hiromi's Watch
  • The Day the Sword Departs

Geo Archon Anecdotes

  • Geo Travel Diary

Friends, Travelers, Lend Me Your Ears...

  • Snapshots
  • Cliffhanger

Once Upon a Time...

  • Snapshots
  • Cliffhanger

Liyue01.requirement: Complete the 3 versions of the commission.

Liyue02.commission: The Little Pirate Goes Out to Sea
Liyue02.notes:
To obtain the commission The Little Pirate Goes Out to Sea you must complete the commissions:

  • Pirate Invasion, in Liyue Harbor!
  • Growing Pains
  • Ahoy! A Pirate's Growth for Ye!
  • Troubles Traveling Through Tributaries

Liyue04.requirement: Find the 5 good signs of the commission.
Liyue04.notes:
The different signs are Granny Shan, Dogs, Cat and fish, Leaves and Pigeons.

The signs are selected randomly during the commission.

Liyue05.notes: To obtain the commission Stairway to Wangshud you must complete the World Quest A Provisional Arrangement.

Liyue06.requirement: Choose the stone with a Cor Lapis inside in the first try.
Liyue06.notes:
It is possible to clip the camera inside the stone to determine which stone to choose for the achievement.

It is not guaranteed that the required stone will appear.

Liyue07.notes:
To obtain the commission A Little Raid you must complete the version of the commission The Lost Relic which gives the item A Box of Gadgets.

This version is guaranteed to appear after completing the other versions at least 3 times.

Liyue08.notes: To obtain the commission So-Called Work you must give the wrong number of ships during the commission One Ship, Two Ships, Three Ships....

Liyue09.notes: To obtain the commission For Old Time's Sake you must complete the commission This Novel Is Amazing! (3 times) and the World Quests Book in the Woods and Will of Stone.

Liyue10.requirement: Sneak a peek at Chang the Ninth's manuscript before delivering it to Xu.

Liyue11.requirement: Ruin 4 different signs of the commission.
Liyue11.notes:
The signs and how to ruin them:

  • Dogs: Chase them away
  • Cat and Fish: Kill the fish or chase the cat away
  • Leaves: Burn them / Blow them away
  • Pigeons: Kill at least 1

The signs are selected randomly during the commission.

Liyue12.requirement: Complete the correct version of the commission.
Liyue12.notes: The version for the achievement appears on the fourth time you receive the commission.

Liyue13.requirement: Complete the correct version of the commission.
Liyue13.notes:
To obtain the commission The Day the Sword Departs you must complete the commission The Sparrow Studies the Blade (3 times).

The version for the achievement will appear on the seventh time you receive the commission The Day the Sword Departs.

Liyue14.requirement: Obtain the 4 stories of the commission.
Liyue14.notes:
The story obtained at the end of the commission depends on the item given.

The story and which item to give to obtain it:

  • The Groundbreaker: A plant or ingredient
  • God of the Stove: An ore
  • God of History: A dish
  • God of Wealth: Glaze Lily

The commission needs to be completed at least 4 times to obtain this achievement.

Liyue15.achievement: Friends, Travelers, Lend Me Your Ears...
Liyue15.requirement: Give the two parts of Ring of Raining Blades to Liu Su.
Liyue15.notes: The commission needs to be completed at least 2 times to obtain this achievement.

Liyue16.requirement: Give The Wrath of Haishan to Liu Su.

InazumaList.title: Inazuma Commissions
InazumaList.description:
13 achievements can be obtained during or by completing commissions in the region of Inazuma.

Inazuma's Commissions are unlocked after completing the World Quest Katheryne in Inazuma which becomes available after completing Archon Quest Ritou Escape Plan (Chapter II: Act I).

Hidden in Plain Sight

  • Bantan Sango Case File
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Search
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Right Identity
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Misdirection
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Case-Closing Time

Is There But One Truth...?

  • Bantan Sango Case File
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Search
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Right Identity
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Misdirection
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Case-Closing Time
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Cleanup Work

Liyue Ichiban

  • The Taste of Home
  • Absolutely Unique Delicacy

Boom Shaka-Laka, More Boom-Shaka-Laka

  • Xiangling丨Trulla Chapter: Act 1
  • The Gourmet Supremos: On the Road
  • The Gourmet Supremos: Breakthrough Thinking

Meal For Two

  • The Gourmet Supremos: The Importance of Eating Well
  • The Gourmet Supremos: Cook-Off

A Question of Diet

  • The Gourmet Supremos: The Importance of Eating Well
  • The Gourmet Supremos: Foodie Quiz

Samurice

  • The Gourmet Supremos: The Importance of Eating Well
  • The Gourmet Supremos: Extreme Cookery

"Sorry for the Trouble!"

  • In Another Land
  • The Farmer's Treasure
  • Inazuma Sales Specialist
  • Post-Sale Service

Editorial Opinion

  • Is This Novel Amazing?
  • This Novel... Seems Familiar?
  • This Novel Seems... Problematic?

You Should Start A Doushin Dojo

  • An Art to Be Honed
  • Battle of Revenge
  • Ceaseless Training

Her and Her Cat

  • A Fishy Flavor
  • Shrine Cleanup
  • The Cat's Trail
  • The Narukami Trail

Well, At Least It Ended

  • Is This Novel Amazing?
  • This Novel... Seems Familiar?
  • This Novel Seems... Problematic?
  • Storytelling Method

Don't Blame the Mora!

  • Meal For Two
  • A Question of Diet
  • Samurice
  • The Gourmet Supremos: Where'd the Ingredients Go?
  • Gourmet Supremos: Within Our Duties

Inazuma01.commission: Bantan Sango Case File: Case-Closing Time
Inazuma01.notes:
To obtain the commission Bantan Sango Case File: Case-Closing Time you must complete the commissions:

  • Bantan Sango Case File
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Search (3 times)
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Right Identity
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Misdirection (3 times)

Inazuma02.commission: Bantan Sango Case File: Cleanup Work
Inazuma02.notes:
To obtain the commission Bantan Sango Case File: Cleanup Work you must complete the commissions:

  • Bantan Sango Case File
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Search (3 times)
  • Bantan Sango Case File: The Right Identity
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Misdirection (3 times)
  • Bantan Sango Case File: Case-Closing Time

Inazuma03.notes: To obtain the commission Absolutely Unique Delicacy you must give a Suspicious dish to Tang Wen during the commission The Taste of Home.

Inazuma04.requirement: Complete the commission after asking Xiangling for ideas.
Inazuma04.notes: You must complete the World Quest The Gourmet Supremos: On the Road to obtain the commission The Gourmet Supremos: Breakthrough Thinking.
Inazuma04.videoLink: Nepyutsu (First chapter of the video)

Inazuma05.requirement: Help Xudong and Kamei Munehisa win their competition once each.
Inazuma05.notes:
The commission needs to be completed at least 2 times.
Once where Xudong wins and once where Kamei Munehisa wins.

Inazuma06.requirement: Answer all 3 questions correctly during the commission.
Inazuma06.notes:
If the recipe is : The answer is

  • Northern Apple Stew : Pepper
  • Tianshu Meat : Qingxin
  • Bamboo Shoot Soup : Bamboo Shoots
  • Tri-Flavored Skewer : Bird Eggs
  • Black-Back Perch Stew : Salt

Inazuma07.requirement: Help Kamei Munehisa gather ingredients from both camps.
Inazuma07.notes:
The commission needs to be completed at least 2 times.
Once by choosing the right camp and once by choosing the left camp.

Inazuma08.requirement: Collect 10 mushrooms and complete the commission.
Inazuma08.notes:
To obtain the commission Post-Sale Service you must give the wrong instructions during the commission Inazuma Sales Specialist.

To obtain the commission Inazuma Sales Specialist you must complete the World Quests In Another Land and The Farmer's Treasure.

Inazuma09.commission: This Novel... Seems Familiar? / This Novel Seems... Problematic?
Inazuma09.notes:
To obtain the commission This Novel... Seems Familiar? you must support Shigeru during the commission Is This Novel Amazing?.
(Keep doing it until you get the commission This Novel... Seems Familiar?)

To obtain the commission This Novel Seems... Problematic? you must support Junkichi during the commission Is This Novel Amazing?.
(Keep doing it until you get the commission This Novel Seems... Problematic?)

If you support one and then the other, the next commission you receive will be random.

Inazuma10.achievement: You Should Start A Doushin Dojo
Inazuma10.notes: To obtain the commission Ceaseless Training you must complete the commission An Art to Be Honed (4 times) and the World Quest Battle of Revenge.

Inazuma11.commission: A Fishy Flavor / Shrine Cleanup / The Cat's Trail
Inazuma11.requirement: Complete the World Quest The Narukami Trail.
Inazuma11.notes:
To obtain the World Quest The Narukami Trail you must complete 4 times the commissions related to Neko.

  • A Fishy Flavor
  • Shrine Cleanup
  • The Cat's Trail

To obtain the commissions related to Neko you must complete the World Quest Series Neko Is a Cat.

Inazuma12.commission: This Novel... Seems Familiar? / This Novel Seems... Problematic?
Inazuma12.notes:
To obtain the World Quest Storytelling Method you must complete the World Quests This Novel... Seems Familiar? and This Novel Seems... Problematic?.

The information to obtain these commissions can be found in the achievement Editorial Opinion.

Inazuma13.commission: The Gourmet Supremos: Where'd the Ingredients Go?
Inazuma13.requirement: Complete the World Quest Gourmet Supremos: Within Our Duties.
Inazuma13.notes:
To obtain the World Quest Gourmet Supremos: Within Our Duties you must:

  • Complete the Chapter 3: Acte 2 of the Archon Quest
  • Obtain the achievement Meal for Two
  • Obtain the achievement A Question of Diet
  • Obtain the achievement Samurice
  • Complete the commission The Gourmet Supremos: Where'd the Ingredients Go?

Once unlocked, the World Quest begins in Sumeru.

SumeruList.title: Sumeru Commissions
SumeruList.description:
17 achievements can be obtained during or by completing commissions in the region of Sumeru.

Sumeru's Commissions are unlocked after completing the World Quest Adventure Takes Courage! which becomes available after completing Archon Quest Dawn (Chapter III: Act II).

Kalimi's Fungus

  • Gold Devouring and Mora Gathering

When Wealth Comes A-Knockin'

  • Gold Devouring and Mora Gathering

Catch Me-ow if You Can!

  • Meow... Meow meow? Meow! Meow.

Principia Arithmetica

  • Garcia's Paean
  • Garcia's Paean: Key Items
  • Garcia's Paean: Substitutes
  • Garcia's Paean: By Bearings
  • Garcia's Paean: Easy Peasy
  • Garcia's Paean: the Echo of Someone

"It's My Job."

  • Tatara Tales: The Last Act
  • Attaché in Another Land

Relaxation Therapy

  • Doctor's Orders

Up by the Roots

  • The Flowers That Won't Grow
  • When Flowers Bloom

The Sky is Vast; The Earth...

  • To Measure the World!

Non-Obligatory Request

  • Project Baby

The Ship Has It

  • Problem Conversion
  • Problem Conversion: Theory Reliability
  • Problem Conversion: Loading Capacity

What's the Matter?

  • Eat and Learn

Scholarly in Sumeru

  • Akademiya Q&A

One Step Too Far

  • Run, Hilmi, Run!

Doctor's Handwriting

  • Good Medicine Is Hard to Come By

A Lingering Fragrance

  • Blooming Sands
  • Desert Bloom
  • Blooming Sands: Lasting Scent

Aha! What's on the Hook?

  • Supreme Hookshot?
  • Cost-Effective Hook

In Those Ruins of Dreams...

  • Principia Arithmetica
  • Garcia's Paean: Key Items
  • Garcia's Paean: Substitutes
  • Where His Life Lies
  • Daydreams Beyond Space and Time

Sumeru01.requirement: Complete the Fortune version of the commission.

Sumeru02.requirement: Complete the Apple Cider version of the commission.

Sumeru03.notes:
The 3 cats are Rozan, Lale and Nargis.
The cat is selected randomly at the start of the commission.

The correct answer for each cat:

  • Rozan: Meow meow meow, meow meow meow.
  • Lale: Meow, meow meow meow, meeeeow!
  • Nargis: Meow! Meow meow, meow.

Sumeru04.commission: Garcia's Paean: the Echo of Someone
Sumeru04.notes:
To obtain the commission Garcia's Paean: the Echo of Someone you must complete the commissions:

  • Garcia's Paean: Key Items (3 times)
  • Garcia's Paean: Substitutes (3 times)
  • Garcia's Paean: By Bearings
  • Garcia's Paean: Easy Peasy (4 timestimes)

You must complete the World Quest Garcia's Paean before you can receive any of the previously mentioned commissions.

Sumeru05.requirement: Collect more than 5 mushrooms and complete the commission.
Sumeru05.notes: To obtain the commission Attaché in Another Land you must complete the World Quest Series Tatara Tales.

Sumeru06.notes:
• Aftab: Give Delicious Steak
  • Azra: Give Sugar
  • Gurgen: Destroy the shrubs in his garden (The commission requires returning to talk to him once completed)

Sumeru07.requirement: Defeat the Whopperflower after the commission.
Sumeru07.notes:
To obtain the commission When Flowers Bloom you must complete the commission The Flowers That Won't Grow several times.

The Whopperflower is not guaranteed to appear at the end of the commission, if it appears you must go kill it and avoid teleporting so it does not despawn.

Sumeru08.achievement: The Sky is Vast; The Earth...
Sumeru08.requirement: Complete the 3 versions of the commission.
Sumeru08.notes: The versions are Setting beacons up, Retrieving beacons and Defeating enemies.

Sumeru09.requirement: Find all 3 snake toys of Gulabgir.
Sumeru09.notes:
There are 5 versions of this commission, 3 of them are required to get the achievement.

The items to collect are:

  • Shabby Rack in the camp with rockslide
  • Strange Bead in the camp with Fungi
  • Strange Tiny Hats in the camp with tree and bird nests

Sumeru10.requirement: Complete the commission after collecting 5 planks in the previous commission.
Sumeru10.notes:
To obtain the commission Problem Conversion: Loading Capacity you must complete the commissions:

  • Problem Conversion
  • Problem Conversion: Theory Reliability

You must collect the 5 planks during the commission Problem Conversion: Theory Reliability.

Sumeru11.requirement: Complete the 3 versions of the commission.

Sumeru12.requirement: Answer correctly to the 6 questions of the commission.
Sumeru12.notes:
3 questions are asked randomly during the commission.
The answers are Amurta, Spantamad, Divine Tree, Wall of Samiel, Sumpter Beast et Fungi.

Sumeru14.commission: Good Medicine Is Hard to Come By
Sumeru14.notes:
There are 3 versions for this commission so 3 different prescriptions:

For the version Can't see well you must select:

  • Starshroom
  • A high flame first, and then a low flame
  • Until the soup deepens in color

For the version Stomachache you must select:

  • Henna Berry
  • Brew on a low flame throughout
  • Until the ingredients turn mushy

For the version Headache you must select:

  • Mint
  • Brew on a high flame throughout
  • Until the ingredients float

Sumeru15.notes:
To obtain the commission Blooming Sands: Lasting Scent you must complete the 3 versions of the commission Desert Bloom.

The versions of the commission Desert Bloom are Zaytun Peach, Lazy Kitten and Watering Plants.

To obtain the commission Desert Bloom you must complete the World Quest Blooming Sands.

It is possible to change the version of the commission Desert Bloom by disconnecting during the first dialogue.

Sumeru16.notes: The World Quest Cost-Effective Hook is obtained by completing 3 times the commission Supreme Hookshot?.

Sumeru17.commission: Garcia's Paean: Key Items / Garcia's Paean: Substitutes
Sumeru17.requirement: Complete the World Quest Daydreams Beyond Space and Time.
Sumeru17.notes:
To obtain the World Quest Daydreams Beyond Space and Time you must complete the World Quest Where His Life Lies.

To obtain the World Quest Where His Life Lies you must complete the Chapter IV: Act V of the Archon Quest and 2 times the commissions Garcia's Paean: Key Items or Garcia's Paean: Substitutes (After obtaining the achievement Principia Arithmetica).

This achievement is a direct continuation of the achievement Principia Arithmetica.
Sumeru17.videoLink: Where His Life Lies - Daydreams Beyond Space and Time

FontaineList.title: Fontaine Commissions
FontaineList.description:
5 achievements can be obtained during or by completing commissions in the region of Fontaine.

Fontaine's Commissions are unlocked after completing the World Quest Another Horizon of Adventure which becomes available after completing Archon Quest As Light Rain Falls Without Reason (Chapter IV: Act II).

Office on the Avenue

  • Tales From the Court

Not Your Average Joe

  • Get a Drink at Least!

Aesthetic Critique

  • Aesthetic Critique: Principles of Aesthetics
  • Aesthetic Critique: Practice of Aesthetics
  • Aesthetic Critique: Self-Critique

Second Childhood

  • Their Childhood
  • Their Childhood: Time Waits for No One
  • Their Childhood: City Caper

New Inspiration! New Products!

  • Fontaine Research Institute Chronicles
  • Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment!
  • Time to Drink

Fontaine01.requirement: Complete the 3 versions of the commission.

Fontaine02.requirement: Complete the commission 3 times without failing.
Fontaine02.notes:
The first two times he will ask you to make a recipe, the third time he will ask you to choose an ingredient.

The recipes are:

  • Latte: Coffee, Milk then Milk foam
  • Clarity Coffee: Coffee then Water
  • Milk Coffee: Coffee, Milk then Cream
  • Espresso: Coffee then Coffee

Fontaine03.notes:
To obtain the commission Aesthetic Critique: Self-Critique you must complete the commissions:

  • Aesthetic Critique: Principles of Aesthetics (2 times)
  • Aesthetic Critique: Practice of Aesthetics

Fontaine04.notes:
To obtain the commission Their Childhood: City Caper you must complete the commissions:

  • Their Childhood (2 times)
  • Their Childhood: Time Waits for No One

Fontaine05.notes:
To obtain the commission Time to Drink you must complete the commission Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment! (3 times).

To obtain the commission Refreshing Fonta, a Font of Refreshment! you must complete the World Quest Series Fontaine Research Institute Chronicles.

NatlanList.title: Natlan Commissions
NatlanList.description:
7 achievements can be obtained during or by completing commissions in the region of Natlan.

Natlan's Commissions are unlocked after completing the World Quest Toward Red-Hot Adventure! which becomes available after completing Archon Quest Pilgrimage of the Return of the Sacred Flame (Chapter V: Act I).

Saurian's Cradle

  • How to Make Friends

Natlan Academic

  • Hmm? Natlan?

"Hora, Come Here—"

  • Tending to a Tepetlisaurus
  • Tending to a Tepetlisaurus: In Need of a Trim

Music Never Dies!

  • Prophets of Pop

Victory From the Flying Leaves

  • Saurian Versus Mountain

Inspiration Walk

  • Sharpshooter on Hand

Citius, Altius, Fortius!

  • Grow Up Quickly, Littl'Un

Natlan01.requirement: Complete the commission by choosing to comfort the Yumkasaurus. (3 times)
Natlan01.notes: The option to choose is I'd suggest you focus on the comforting..

Natlan02.requirement: Complete the commission by correctly answering all questions.
Natlan02.notes:
Who are the companions of the Children of Echoes? What is their true name?

  • Tepetlisaurus

What is the name of the tribe where the Yumkasaurs live?

  • The Scions of the Canopy

Natlan has a certain thing. It can be used for forging ... What's the name of that thing?

  • Phlogiston

Who are the companions of the People of the Springs? What is their true name?

  • Koholasaurus

In Natlan, there is a type of mushroom that contains phlogiston. What is its name?

  • Candlecap Mushroom

In Natlan, there is a type of flower that contains phlogiston. What is its name?

  • Embercore Flower

Natlan03.commission: Tending to a Tepetlisaurus: In Need of a Trim
Natlan03.requirement: Complete the commission without trimming Hora's claws.
Natlan03.notes: To obtain the commission Tending to a Tepetlisaurus: In Need of a Trim you must complete the commission Tending to a Tepetlisaurus.

Natlan04.notes:
The record is found on a crate, do not destroy this crate to avoid damaging the record.

Milu Nui asks to retrieve the record after completing the commission Prophets of Pop at least once.

Natlan05.requirement: Reach the destination within the time limit.
Natlan05.notes: This commission has two versions. If the commission does not require climbing a mountain, there is no achievement to get.

Natlan06.requirement: Complete the main task and the optional task.
Natlan06.notes:
This commission has 3 versions so the tasks differ depending on the version.

Photos to take for the optional tasks:

  • Djembe Studios: Two other famous stores
  • Stage Tepetl: Large gemstone shop
  • Courier's Longhouse: Huge mural at the cliffs

SnezhnayaList.title: Snezhnaya Commissions
SnezhnayaList.description: I do not work at HoYoverse.
